process.name: start
process.label: Initiate was crawl disseminationWF of the object

process.name: warc-extractor
process.label: Extracts WARC files from WACZ files

process.name: cdx-merge-sort-publish
process.label: Sort individual new CDX files, merge into existing openwayback cdx file

process.name: path-indexer
process.label: Update the path index with the new (W)ARCs

process.name: cdxj-merge
process.label: Merge new CDX into existing pywb CDX file
